Add various graph metrics to spatial CCC graph

Source: R/spatial_ccc.R
add_spatial_ccc_graph_metrics.Rd

See below and tidygraph::graph_measures for how these metrics are computed.

Usage

add_spatial_ccc_graph_metrics(sp_ccc_graph, from_scratch = TRUE)

Arguments

sp_ccc_graph

an output of to_spatial_ccc_graph()

from_scratch

if TRUE, the existing metrics are wiped clean.

Graph metrics include:

  1. For overall graph

    • graph_n_nodes

    • graph_n_edges

    • graph_component_count

    • graph_motif_count

    • graph_diameter

    • graph_un_diameter

    • graph_mean_dist

    • graph_circuit_rank = graph_n_edges - graph_n_nodes + graph_component_count

    • graph_reciprocity

    • graph_clique_num (sp_ccc_graph assumed as undirected)

    • graph_clique_count (sp_ccc_graph assumed as undirected)

  2. For each sub-graph (after group_components())

    • group_n_nodes

    • group_n_edges

    • group_adhesion

    • group_motif_count

    • group_diameter

    • group_un_diameter

    • group_mean_dist

    • group_girth

    • group_circuit_rank

    • group_reciprocity
